alert.note: Alert for Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 3:50PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Tom Green County through 415 PM CDT... At 349 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Harriet, or near San Angelo, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Angelo State Park, O.c. Fisher Reservoir and Harriet. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
